Address: 47 Oak Tree Road CROYDON NORTH VIC 3136
Description:
YOUR VERY OWN HIDE-AWAY
Nestled at the end of a lovely tree-lined, no-through road, hidden behind a tall fence and wrought iron gates. Sit on a huge 1313m2 (approx) allotment, this is a home for those who love their privacy. The home itself is a classic colonial style home with formal lounge/dining, fully equipped Tasmanian Oak kitchen, three bedrooms plus a study (master with ensuite), double garage, gas ducted heating, and lovely established gardens. The lounge has a huge open fire and French doors open out from both the lounge and family room. Try and resist the resort style 7 meter spa and lap pool which is fully automated and gas heated. Call now for a private inspection.
Tony Smith : 0411 424 964

Description:
A Growing Family's Dream 1131sqm.
Are you seeking a spacious floor plan and a big block for your growing family? Take a look at this smart 4 bedroom brick veneer family home. In fact this immaculate one owner home is set on 1131 sqm. (approx.) and is ready to enjoy. Lush landscaped gardens create impact, while the modern interior boasts 4 privately zoned bedrooms (BIRs), serviced by a spa bath bathroom. The master bedroom has ensuite and ceiling fan. Delight in a well-equipped Tas. Oak kitchen fitted with gas cooking appliances and dishwasher. Three zoned living areas will make family life easy - a large split-level lounge/dining room, a spacious family/meals room and a rumpus room with polished floorboards. Enjoy the green treed outlook on the elevated deck, which is covered for all-seasons' entertaining. The beautiful landscaped gardens are very private there's a veggie patch and many areas for children and adults alike. With extensive under-house storage and space for a workshop, plus appointments: ducted heating (only 2 years old), ducted vacuum, evaporative cooling, ironing cabinet, 7,500-litres water storage, shed and double carport. Close to Hochkins Ridge Flora Reserve, shops, Village School Primary, Oxley College and Chirnside shopping. Act now!

Description:
BRAND NEW AND READY NOW!
Ready to move straight into sitting privately at the rear of your own drive is the ultra chic ultra modern and ultra new 3 bedrooms weatherboard home. Stunning timber floors and carpeted bedrooms caress space and light open living where tri-folding glass doors open to sensational entertaining deck. Where the Ceasarstone hostess kitchen has latest stainless steel appliances, the euro laundry impresses and the 'wow' ensuite and bathroom blow your mind with their skylights and designer tiles! A garden shed, carport and water tank this is as complete and as new as it gets. Move in straight away and enjoy life!

Description:
Indoor and Outdoor Comfort
Pristinely maintained and set in a quiet street amongst a lovely treescape, this charming brick home will have high appeal. Destined to suit investors, empty nesters and executive couples, living space, outdoor living and ample bedrooms are all equally fabulous in this residence. High ceilings, gorgeous light fittings and ornamental ceiling roses add to the atmosphere of a floorplan that delivers an air of openness with the practicality of sectioned living. A delightful entrance has internal access to the double garage, a wide hallway walks through to a spacious formal lounge and on to an open kitchen and living room. With ample space for lounging and dining, plus the generously equipped kitchen including loads of bench space, great cupboards, dishwasher and large gas cook top. Just outside an outdoor room and rear yard provide a beautiful oasis. Decked flooring and quality, clear cafe blinds keep this area protected from weather, making it the perfect all season living zone. The garden is well maintained and provides a cross between low maintenance and beautifully established plants, so that garden lovers can tend to a few roses and hydrangeas. Back inside, the master bedroom comes with a spacious ensuite and walk-in robe, while a grand sized bathroom services a further two robed bedrooms. Comforting and practical extras include gas ducted heating, ducted evaporative cooling and a roomy laundry with access to a discreetly positioned clothesline. All of this is set within close proximity to shops and transport, and is ready to make a gorgeous home for a lucky new buyer.
Carl Payne : 0413 589 800

Description:
So Many Choices
As a 1st home buyer, family buyer, investor, developer (stca) or those wanting to downsizing, this is a home that has options and choices for everyone.
Located on a good size block of 862m2(approximately) this neat and tidy brick veneer home comes complete with 4 robed bedrooms, the main has updated ensuite and double robes, the formal entry and hall will lead you to the spacious lounge room and then beyond to the meals area adjoining the kitchen.
The light filled kitchen is centrally located and well equipped with quality stainless steel appliances. There are loads of other internal features such as polished hardwood floors, gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling, main bathroom with separate toilet plus light neutral colours and tones.
Outside you will discover a large expansive entertaining balcony running almost the width of the home, that is sure to be the best spot in the warmer months for you to sit back relax and enjoy a cold drink after a hard days work or to have a family gathering, party or casual BBQ all whilst soaking up the view over the large backyard and taking in the sights and sounds of local wildlife in the surrounding garden.
All this is not far away from Croydon central and strolling distance to Croydon North shops, local schools, kindergartens and parkland's.
So many choices, so many options, so be quick and book your viewing today.

Description:
Young & Stunning
At only 8 years young, this executive-style brick veneer home offers a stunning lifestyle for Busy Professionals, Investors or Downsizers. In fact it's a one-owner home and is set on a low-maintenance block in a prized court just a short walk from transport, McAdam Square shops and Luther College. Beautiful landscaped gardens set the scene from the street. The inside story will also impress you hardwood polished floorboards, contemporary carpets and quality window furnishings. Delight in a sparkling open plan gourmet kitchen showcasing s/s Bosch appliances. Two zoned living areas invite a relaxed lifestyle a spacious family/meals room with doors to the deck, and a chic lounge room with stylish casement windows opening to the garden. Discover 3 good-sized bedrooms (2 with fitted mirrored BIRs, master with WIR), serviced by a deluxe bathroom and separate toilet. The private master boasts a corner spa bath ensuite. Finally enjoy an easy care paved and landscaped courtyard garden, highlighted by a feature wall. Quality appointments: secure internal access remote lock-up garage, ducted heating, split system air-conditioning and storage shed. Walk to Croydon Hills Primary, reserves and bus. Close to Eastland and EastLink. Don't miss it!
* Photo ID required for all Open Home Inspections
* To view our office profile, please click on Virtual Tour Link.

Description:
Sized for Your Family’s Future
Set on over 1000SQM (approx) this home provides a variety of opportunities for families. Refurbished to provide bright and modern living spaces, this home is set in a peaceful cul-de-sac and offers expansive front and back yards.
Centrally placed, the spacious living area acts as the heart of the home, drawing an abundance of natural light through large windows. The kitchen and bathroom have been lovingly renovated for aesthetics and functionality, the bathroom offering sparkling fixtures and an extra wide vanity, while the well-proportioned bedrooms offer BIRs and have been freshly painted.
The sprawling backyard is well-suited to families, offering ample space for children and pets, as well as a sizeable decking complete with covered entertaining space.
Offering floorboards, a large double lockup garage/ shed and set moments from shops and prestigious schools, the property provides several conveniences.

Description:
A vision of family perfection Under/Offer
Perfection starts with a leafy tranquil setting at the end of a quiet court, and follows with a beautifully presented home boasting stylish indoor living zones and fabulously inviting outdoor spaces. Featuring polished timber floors and floods of natural light, this delightful family home comprises tiled entrance hall with fabulous storage, spacious open-plan kitchen/meals/living area, 3 comfortable bedrooms (main with walk-in robe and modern ensuite), light family bathroom, and laundry with external access. The gleaming white kitchen features Bosch stainless steel appliances, ample storage, and functional breakfast bar, whilst the stylish living zone spills out onto a HUGE deck (with built in day beds) for chic entertaining on a grand scale. Beyond the alfresco entertaining zone a lovely low-maintenance garden extends out to near level lawn and large powered shed. Additional features include ducted heating, 3 x split system air conditioners, ducted vacuum, quality blinds and shutters, under-house storage, and a generous double carport with access to rear garden for additional secure parking. This peaceful family retreat is deceptively close to all local conveniences, including Croydon North Plaza, schools, bus, train and parklands - act quickly to secure the effortless family lifestyle you've been aspiring to.

Description:
A Lifestyle that's Completely Hassle-Free
Busy Professionals, Young Families and Retirees looking for a spacious design without the maintenance, must see this beautiful young brick veneer retreat. It's positioned in an exclusive bowl-of-court location and is just a short walk to Yarra Rd Primary and transport. Bay windows, a front verandah and pristine landscaped gardens create instant appeal. The light interior is stylishly decorated with quality window furnishings and modern carpets. Two zoned living areas invite easy living and entertaining. Discover a spacious formal lounge room and a large family/meals room - both with bay windows and garden views. Delight in an open plan gourmet kitchen featuring quality appliances, Bosch dishwasher and excellent storage. Three spacious bedrooms (BIRs) are serviced by a deluxe family bathroom, while the privately zoned master has ensuite and WIR. Complemented by a large covered entertaining area and a lovely landscaped courtyard. Appointments: ducted heating, evaporative cooling, alarm, shed and remote double lock-up garage with a workshop (rear/undercover access). A quality home in a prized location - close to shops, transport, Luther College, reserves and EastLink. Enquire now!
* Photo ID required for all Open Home Inspections
* To view our office profile, please click on Virtual Tour Link.

Description:
Comfortable And Quality Living
Set within a modern complex in a lovely parkland environment, this youthful two bedroom unit promises wide appeal. Featuring a light-filled interior, a well-executed single level floor plan plus a generous but low maintenance rear yard, this property will make a smart investment opportunity, a great first home, or a picture perfect base for executive couples or empty nesters needing an easy care home with comfort and security. Comprising a roomy living zone, a carpeted lounge sweeps around to a fully equipped kitchen with dishwasher, ample cupboards and great floor space. From there, the meals zone integrates beautifully with the outdoor living, glass doors providing a pleasant outlook and easy access to the courtyard. With plenty of room for outdoor dining, plus some grass to play on, and even a raised garden bed with your very own gum tree for shade. Built in robes in both bedrooms, gas ducted heating, ducted cooling, a neat and tidy bathroom with bath, a separate toilet, and a single lockup garage provide both practical and comforting inclusions. Within walking distance to the convenience of shops and transport, this home promises to be snapped up quick smart. Call to arrange your inspection now!
James Brougham : 0412 620 498

Description:
Fantastic Family Find
Presented with poise on approximately 860SQM’s, this lovingly renovated residence enjoys elevated vistas, landscaped gardens and a tranquil, nature-infused location.
Inside, pristine interiors are enhanced by hardwood floors, space and tasteful hues. The large lounge and adjacent dining room smoothly transition to the well-appointed kitchen with views over the family/meals area and alfresco patio bordered by a large backyard perfectly proportioned for pets.
Privately positioned, the bedrooms boast spacious proportions, built-in robes and the services of a sleek, modern bathroom (master with walk-in robe and immaculate ensuite). Located for ultimate convenience, this beautiful home finds itself close to parkland, local shops, public transport, a range of schools, and an easy drive to EastLink, and major shopping centres. Features: ducted heating and cooling, a large double garage (storage area underneath), spacious backyard for children’s play area (or granny flat subject to council approval), huge patio for outdoor entertaining.
The perfect spot for a young family in a safe and friendly court location. Don’t miss it.

Description:
TERRIFIC FIRST HOME OR DEVELOPMENT (STCA)
Whether you are looking for your first home or a possible development property (STCA), don't miss this opportunity!
This well presented older style weatherboard home is set on 653sqm & is requiring some TLC.
The large lounge/dining room overlooks the well established front gardens, whilst the spacious kitchen adjoins the sunroom & leads to the pleasant rear verandah.
There's a single lock up garage & storage shed.
Features include near new gas heater, split system, & new colour bond roof.
Call today to arrange an inspection & bring your along your own ideas!
Sue Jackson : 0409 932 109

Description:
A Well Rounded Investment!
Set within a young and manicured complex, this well-appointed townhouse will make an exemplary investment! A generous floorplan delivers a tiled entrance and carpeted front lounge room, and then a wide hallway leads through to a large, second open plan living zone. Practically equipped with tiled flooring there's room for relaxation and meals, plus a modern kitchen with stylish dark cabinetry, dishwasher and great cupboard space. A partially covered, north facing entertaining area is easily accessed through glass sliding doors off the living zone, the perfect space to enjoy breakfast, lunch or dinner outside and then a cute yard provides room for a spot of gardening and playing. A family sized bathroom services two robed bedrooms, while the master comes with an attractive ensuite and walk-in robe. There's gas ducted heating and evaporative cooling, timber venetians, internal access to the double lockup garage and great cupboard storage. This one ticks all the boxes, including a fabulous location that's within close proximity to schools, shops, transport, parks and reserves. Offering a low maintenance, perfectly maintained and presented investment package, this one will be snapped up quick smart. Be quick to arrange your inspection today.
Geoff Thompson
